greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of 3-smooth divisors of n.
comment: Multiplicative with a(2^e) = 2^(e+1)-1, a(3^e) = (3^(e+1)-1)/2, a(p^e) = 1, p>3. _Christian G. Bower_ May 20, 2005.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := If[p > 3, 1, (p^(e + 1) - 1)/(p - 1)]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ (f @@@ FactorInteger[n]); Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Aug 29 2019 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 13 2002
